specifications.Finish: Chemical > Water Repellent Water repellent finishing is a chemical treatment applied to the fabric surface to make water bead and roll off. This enhances resistance to light rain and splashes, helping garments stay drier and more comfortable without compromising breathability.
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > Water Repellent Due to the nature of the chemical coating agents, chalk marks may appear on the surface of the fabric. Please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Do not dry clean Performance Downproof Downproof fabric is tightly woven and has flattened piles, preventing down from escaping. This makes it ideal for use in insulated products like jackets, duvets, and sleeping bags. Windproof Windproof is a function that blocks wind from passing through and helps retain body heat. Recommended Use Windbreakers, Raincoat, Nylon Shorts, Puffer, Swimwear
